front.title: Traffic Engineering Database Management Information Base in support of MPLS-TE/GMPLS

abstract.t: This memo defines the Management Information Base (MIB) objects in order to manage traffic engineering database (TED) information with extension in support of Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) with traffic engineering (TE) as well as Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) for use with network management protocols.
